Posts.Content: Oct 10, 2018 01:11PM Kake wrote: I have decided on a double. Just diagnosed with DCIS but cancer runs in the family and I don't want to go through this again. I also do not want to go through chemo or radiation.. So many decisions. You say you are happy with results.. did you opt for reconstruction at the time of the mastectomy? I cannot decide if I want recon or not. I just want the invasion of my chest to be finished.
Posts.Title: Uni or double Samnjb MCBaker
